result.execSummary:
The defendant Gregory M. GNADT was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • PTC Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant has paid his portion of the restitution.
The Court imposes a $250.00 fine plus costs, total of $768.00, to be paid by 03-29-15 or 15 days county jail for failure to pay.
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.
Minutes.

Count 2 - PTC Theft - No contest plea.  Convicted.  State moves to dismiss and read in count 1, PTC Burglary and count 3, PTC Theft.  Motion granted.  Sentencing hearing is set for 01-29-15 at 11:30 a.m.   
Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights. 
Minutes.

Request for Adjournment;  Order for Adjournment.
Pretrial conference is reset to 01-09-15 at 8:30 a.m.
Jury trial is reset to 01-13-15 at 8:30 a.m. no: 2 position.

Pretrial Conference scheduled for 10-13-2014 @ 11:30 a.m. BR-3.
Jury Trial scheduled for 10-15-2014 @ 8:30 a.m. BR-3.

Plea Hearing scheduled for 06-10-2014 @ 2:00 p.m. BR-3.
Rescheduled from 05-19-2014.

Notice of Motion to Suppress Statements of Defendant; Motion to Suppress Statements of Defendant.
Notice of Motion; Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 3 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed. Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty pleas entered.  Jury calendar.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is set for 05-02-14 at 11:00 a.m.
Plea date is set for 05-19-14 at 10:30 a.m.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
Minutes.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing is set for 03-18-14 at 1:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $1,500.00 recognizance bond with the condition that defendant must report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for fingerprints, photographs and identifying information within 24 hours and defendant is to have no contact with Dale Kopidlansky or any property of Dale Kopidlansky.  Bail furnished.   
Minutes.

Letter from Attorney Pozorski, Jr to the Court.  
Fax cover sheet.

RE:  Dale Kopidlansky, on 12-07-13.
Initial appearance is set for 03-03-14 at 2:30 p.m.
